description.value:
Grants +5 to Navigation(Surface) Tests, Good Craftsmanship gives +10. Helps with knowing where you are, Poor versions may simply be a set of maps on a data-slate, more advanced can be multi-level orbital uplinks that provide exact locations.

Requirements

Astartes Versions start at +10

Effect: Rare / Initiated

Notes: 5 R
